renewal_terms: Automatically for successive annual periods ending on January 18th of each year, provided such continuance is specifically approved annually.

clauses.name: Indemnification
clauses.text: Section 4.1 and 4.2 detail the indemnification obligations of both the Fund and Integrity.

custom_fields.services_as_underwriter: Integrity will act as principal underwriter for the distribution of the Shares covered by the registration statement.
custom_fields.duties_of_the_fund: The Fund agrees to execute documents, furnish information, and take actions necessary for the qualification of the Shares for sale.
custom_fields.representations_and_warranties: The Fund represents that all registration statements, prospectuses, and statements of additional information filed by the Fund with the SEC are prepared in conformity with the requirements.

payment_terms: Integrity shall receive the excess of the sales price over the net asset value of Shares sold, and any distribution and/or service fees applicable to the Shares as authorized by the Shareholder Services Plan.
